title: Night Wizard
synopsis: Night Wizard. A term given to those whose mission is to protect the world from impending darkness. Renji Hiiragi is one such Night Wizard, who is constantly called on missions, even though all he wants is to be able to go to school and graduate.
characters: ['Himuro, Akari', 'Hiiragi, Renji', 'Anzelotte', 'Zephyr, Bell', 'Kirihito', 'Shihou, Elis', 'Akabane, Kureha', 'Nightmare', 'Mu, RaRa', 'Andou, Kurusu']
